articles.description: David De Gea and Jaap Stam both endured miserable first competitive-ish appearances for Man Utd. Alan Shearer had a 'mare against the Red Devils...
articles.content:
David De Gea and Jaap Stam both endured miserable first competitive-ish appearances for Man Utd. Alan Shearer had a ‘mare against the Red Devils.
